subject: Tennis
Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
lead_paragraph: The top-half quarterfinals at Wimbledon feature Serena Williams, Victoria Azarenka and Maria Sharapova; the bottom-half matches include four players who have never won a Grand Slam event or reached No. 1.
snippet: The top-half quarterfinals at Wimbledon feature Serena Williams, Victoria Azarenka and Maria Sharapova; the bottom-half matches include four players who have never won a Grand Slam event or reached No. 1.
